name: Sprill - The Mystery of the Bermuda Triangle
summary: Open your eyes for the thrilling hidden object game Sprill - The Mystery of the Bermuda Triangle! Sprill is relaxing on his boat when all of a sudden three aliens sink his boat to the bottom of the ocean and tell him they need his help finding the Pearl of Poseidon. Assist Sprill by finding objects and finishing mini-games, and help him save an entire planet!
